overview: Work Loads brings sex in the work place up into the light! Up on the desk, under the conference table, in the break room or even at home on the job... these men just won't wait to get off work before they get off. Jimmy Durano leads the way banging the hell out of superstar Roman Heart in a stunning scene. With an all-star cast featuring Matthew Rush, Alexander Garrett, Trace Hunter, Drake Jaden, Adam Rogue, Alex Slater and Trey Turner, these are four scorching hot sex scenes guaranteed to keep you a working stiff.
title: Work Loads
